name: NeonSportz
description:
The newest and upcoming Franchise League Tool that takes your league to the next level.

Includes discord account integration, a home page, games, statistics, players, teams, and more!

DISCORD LOGIN
No need to remember another password, just login with Discord and it’ll automatically sync your information with our platform.

PROFILE
Shows all the leagues you are in along with your social connections.

LEAGUE HOME
Show the current statistic leaders along with the playoff race.

PLAYERS
Search for any player in your league easily. Filter by name, position, team, and more to find the player you are looking for.

TEAMS
See all of the teams in your league in once place along with their standings, team owner, injury count, and more.

TRADE APPROVAL REQUESTS
Create trade approval requests for members of your league to vote on. Saves you hours of time combing through the players and their attributes.

GAMES
View your past and upcoming games. Scores, team statistics, and player statistics all in once place.

STATISTICS
View all of your player’s statistics such as passing, rushing, receiving, and defense. You can even filter by week and year.

These are just some of the key features that we offer. The app is free to download, but it costs to connect your league.
